de.bitbrain.braingdx.event

Interface GameEventManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameEventManagerImpl

    public interface GameEventManager
    Manages game events. Register an GameEventListener in order to listen to game events, then published by this manager. When there is no GameEventListener registered for a published event, this manager will not throw any exception, but will log an error.
    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all listeners.
      <T extends GameEvent> 
      void      		 clear(Class<T> clazz)
      Clears all listeners listening on the defined GameEvent.
      <T extends GameEvent> 
      void      		 publish(T event)
      Publishes a new game event to all registered listeners.
      <T extends GameEvent> 
      void      		 register(GameEventListener<T> listener, Class<T> clazz)
      Registers a new listener to this manager.
      <T extends GameEvent> 
      void      		 unregister(GameEventListener<T> listener, Class<T> clazz)
      Unregisters an existing listener.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        <T extends GameEvent> void register(GameEventListener<T> listener,
                                  Class<T> clazz)
        Registers a new listener to this manager. It is possible to register more than one GameEventListener of the same type.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        clazz - the class of the event to listen on

      • unregister

        <T extends GameEvent> void unregister(GameEventListener<T> listener,
                                    Class<T> clazz)
        Unregisters an existing listener. Will log an error when the listener does not exist.

      • publish

        <T extends GameEvent> void publish(T event)
        Publishes a new game event to all registered listeners.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all listeners.

      • clear

        <T extends GameEvent> void clear(Class<T> clazz)
        Clears all listeners listening on the defined GameEvent.
